name: claude-code-panel
description: Panel system for structured multi-perspective analysis with dynamic agent assignment. Convenes panel characters (The Adversary, The Architect, The Curator, etc.) for systematic inquiry across 11 phases.

agentFabricator.description: agent-fabricator enables dynamic agent creation during panels. If not present, panels use existing agents only.

prerequisites.framework: AGENTS.md with Authority Hierarchy (DAG) and Mode Selection protocols
prerequisites.memory: Memory Bank architecture (optional but recommended for session continuity)
prerequisites.sessionWatching: Work/sessions/ directory for panel decision logging (optional)
